input.sentences: there was a bike race going on .
lining up for the beginning of the race .
this guy had a crate on his bike for water .
quick stop for a beautiful view .
the police were there to keep things under control .
output.sentences: The bike race was to begin.
The bicyclists lined up at the starting line.
At the rear rode the guy bringing a water crate.
There was little time to stop for a quick view.
Police were in place for crowd control.
